700508f-a.text:
1437 to 1447 Boston Road, adjoining and north of the W.W. corner of
Prospect Ave.
About A915,
Neg.~1144
700508f-a.folder: Boston Road & Prospect Avenue, Bronx, NY

701661f-a.text:
1438 Prospect Ave., north side, between Boston Road and Crotona Park East. Robinson and Bromley's map of 1879 shows it to have stood on property belonging to J. L. Mott. The house is at this date (1938) no longer in existence, its site being occupied by a Synagogue.

1914.
Gift of Samuel Landsman
701661f-a.folder: Prospect Avenue & Boston Road, Bronx, NY
